analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  kusala ttika saṅkiliṭṭha ttika
translated: The Dhamma Paccayuppanna, Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi🔽.. The wholesome triad, the defiled triad

analyzed: na kusalam na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to the wholesome, undefiled, uncorrupted phenomenon as condition … (abbreviated).

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: As condition being by way of root, twenty-one; as object, seventeen … as decisive support, twenty-one.

original: Nakusalaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: With respect to the wholesome, undefiled, uncorrupted phenomenon as condition … (abbreviated).

analyzed: na kusalam na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca
translated: As condition being by way of root, twenty-four … as decisive support, twenty-one … as object, seventeen … as nutriment, seventeen … as faculty, seventeen … as association, seventeen … as presence, seventeen … as non-disappearance, seventeen.🔽With respect to the wholesome, undefiled, uncorrupted phenomenon as condition … (abbreviated).

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: As condition being by way of root, twenty-nine; as object, twenty-four … as decisive support, twenty-nine.
